R

readFromFile(Object) - Static method in class inputOutput.FileOps
Static method will read reports.txt file and fill the program with all the data from the previous run to make data persist across program reruns.
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
This method will remove the Company corresponding to the Stock Symbol inputed as a parameter only if this Company has no Shareholders.
RemoveCompanyAction - Class in menuClases
This class describes the Remove Company Option in the Administration of Company's Menu
RemoveCompanyAction() - Constructor for class menuClases.RemoveCompanyAction
 
removeShareholder(String) - Method in class dataManagment.DMComponent
Sets the Shareholder that matches the id as an inactive Shareholder only if this Shareholder doesn't own any Shares of any Company.
RemoveShareholderAction - Class in menuClases
This Class describes the Remove Shareholder Option from the Administration of Shareholders Menu.
RemoveShareholderAction() - Constructor for class menuClases.RemoveShareholderAction
 
report() - Method in class objects.Company
This method will create a report of all of the Company's Shares owned by Shareholders and then output it as a String.
